title: New & MPfree: Gonjasufi – Nikels & Dimes
content:
We here at CITR are huge fans of LA based psych-hop artist Gonjasufi, so much so that one of our first articles, (way back in April 2010), was a detailed review of his debut LP, A Sufi and a Killer. The work that followed was equally as impressive, the last example was the free EP he dropped only last month. It seems that Gonja is on a roll, with his next body of work due to be released in Warp on January 23.

The first cut from the mini album is a haunting, soothing yet remarkably brittle assault on the senses. When describing his work, it’s admittedly easy to contradict, at least on the surface. Yet perhaps this reveals a beauty within the work?

Steam the new track below and input your email to download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
